metadata.synopsis: One liner AD of Rolan after teleporting himself to Ramazith's Tower due to Lorroakan having been killed there.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill lorroakan in CTY_Main_A 4960; 0; 705 and kill any subsequent combat. Rolan will appear by the teleporter and run to Lorroakan saying this line.

0.speaker: Rolan
0.context: NodeContext: confusion, then shock and worry as he sees his dead master
